description: Change of use from Motor Repair Centre (Use Class B2) to Use Class E) (retrospective).
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<span id="docs-internal-guid-526011f8-7fff-e761-e349-6967ec7d2dee"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Within&nbsp;six months of the date of this permission, precise details of cycle parking provision which is safe, secure and accessible for all shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The cycle parking shall thereafter be implemented in full in accordance with the approved details and shall thereafter be retained solely for its designated use.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To ensure adequate provision for the safe and secure storage of bicycles, to promote sustainable modes of transport and in the interest of safeguarding highway safety in accordance with Policy LP42 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></div></span>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Within six months of the date of this permission, precise details of the waste and recycling storage shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The waste and recycling storage shall thereafter be implemented in full in accordance with the approved details and shall thereafter be retained solely for its designated use.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-256733e2-7fff-5f17-6a93-7c2b2c276448"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure suitable provision for the users of the development, to encourage the sustainable management of waste and to safeguard the visual amenities of the area in accordance with Policies LP2 and LP57 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The floorspace shown on the approved plans to be used for Use Class E purposes shall be used as either Use Class E(d) or E(g)(i) and for no other purpose in Class E of the Town and Country (Use Classes) Order 1987 (or any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification). Furthermore, notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification) the floorspace within Use Class E(d) or E(g)(i) shall not change use by any means under the Town and Country (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9230e26a-7fff-de88-1bc6-37991ff9a28a"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To enable the local planning authority to retain control of the use and to ensure that other uses are not introduced without further assessment in accordance with Policies LP27, LP28 and LP30 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span></p>
